description: Try our easy to follow Velvety Double Choc Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Velvety Double Choc Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 290g Nestle Bakers' Choice Dark Choc Melts
90g Nestle Bakers' Choice Dark Choc Melts, melted and cooled

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180oC/160oC fan forced. Grease and line a 23cm spring form cake pan with baking paper.

In a large saucepan over low heat; add butter, 200g Dark Melts (reserving 90g for choc curls) and instant coffee, stirring until smooth. Pour in sweetened condensed milk and stir until combined. Fold through flour, cocoa powder and baking powder. Pour into pan and bake for 20-30 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.
Combine gelatine and 1/3 cup (80ml) hot water. Stir until gelatine dissolves and cool for 5 minutes.

Beat cream cheese, sugar and cream in a medium bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Add gelatine mixture and extra Nestlé Bakers’ Choice Dark Melts; beat until just combined; pour into pan over cooled base. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight until set.
With remaining 90g Dark Melts, over the base of a baking tray, refrigerate until just set. Then carefully scrape at a 45° angle using a knife to create curls.
Warm outside of pan with a hot cloth, then gently release cake from pan to serve. Cut into slices and serve.
